  • About

Rolando Mathias is a Stockholm based, Brooklyn bred, Digital Designer currently designing a fintech product from scratch at Advinans.

Advinans

A digital platform that offers proven investment strategies, tailored advice, and high-quality financial services- all with low, transparent fees- to all of Sweden. Comparable services were previously out of reach for most of the population.

  • EXPERIENCE DESIGN
  • VISUAL DESIGN
Read More

Chelsea FC

A complete responsive web redesign for the global football club. I was apart of the small team of designers, working with Chelsea’s in-house tech team, based in London for 5 weeks in 2016.

  • EXPERIENCE DESIGN
  • VISUAL DESIGN
Project under NDA until launch.

Accessor

A complete desktop app redesign for a vehicle fleet management system. Accessor’s product allows fleet managers to interact with their drivers, observe their vehicles, look up and assign tasks- all in real time- in order to orchestrate jobs/trips.

  • EXPERIENCE DESIGN
Case study coming soon.
